text: The perfect solution would be being able to have a type such that Symbolic{T} <: T. I imagine if we figure out a trick to make method lookups fast for that it could be possible. Might have weird implications that i haven’t thought of but so far seems to fit in just fine.

text: Can this be solved with something traitor.jl? Either T or Symbolic becomes a trait
